query.statement:
SELECT 0 AS CHECK,'' AS FLAG ,A.PSPID,A.POSID, A.CHGNO , B.ZZACTSS, B.TEXT30 , --TEAM Á¦¿Ü -- (CASE WHEN B.ZZACTSS = '02' AND B.ZTEAM = '' THEN '°­³²ÆÀ' -- WHEN B.ZZACTSS = '02' AND B.ZTEAM = 'X' THEN '°­ºÏÆÀ' -- ELSE '' -- END) AS TEAM, D.NAME1, B.NAMET, B.NAMET2, B.ZZSHIP1, B.ZZCOMP2, A.TOT, B.TXT30, F.ZSITE_NM, B.ZSPEC1, B.ZSPEC2, (SUBSTR(D.LIFNR,1,3)||'-'||SUBSTR(D.LIFNR,4,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(D.LIFNR,6,5)) AS LIFNR, TRIM(D.MCOD3)||TRIM(D.STRAS) AS ADDR, D.J_1KFREPRE AS REP, C.CRDAT
FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS F INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0102 AS A ON F.MANDT = A.MANDT AND F.POSID = A.PSPID
INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.POSID AND A.POSID = B.POSID_1
INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0112 AS C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.PSPID = C.PSPID AND A.POSID = C.POSID AND C.PRONR = '06'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.LFA1 AS D ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.LIFNR = D.LIFNR
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# --AND A.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
AND B.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
AND D.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
AND C.CRDAT BETWEEN #SUP_DTF# AND #SUP_DTT#
AND A.PSPID = #PSPID#
AND B.ZZGUBUN = '10'
order by NAME1,TEAM with ur
